creditline: Gift of Gerald Ray Nelson and Joanne Hogan Nelson
description: recto: elf with large hands extended, wearing a tunic, tights and a tall cap with crown-like brim, standing in front of a snow-covered pine tree; verso: landscape with tall, thin trees at left and right edges; view of a flat middle ground with small hills in background; low horizon line
inscription:
Signature and Inscription

ULC, recto, in red: [This / side]
provenance: The artist; his stepdaughter, Joanie Nelson, Vancouver, WA
title: Untitled, recto and verso [elf, recto; landscape, verso]
